author: Retro Game Corps
description:
The AYN Odin 3 is so powerful that the Android software ecosystem still needs to catch up.  Let's take a look at this performance king and the current state of gaming on the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.

Buy one here: https://tinyurl.com/RGC-Odin3
Odin 3 impressions video: https://youtu.be/dvXnCZQwJPQ
Android handheld starter guide: https://youtu.be/I4mqgcDYZFo

Correction: with GameNative, you need to choose "Export for Frontend" instead of "Create Shortcut" if you want to export the Steam file for ES-DE.

This video includes a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this video ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

title: Odin 3 Review: A New Handheld Frontier
